html.p: Drawing your weapon, you advance on the grey-robed man, but two heavily built ruffians step into your path. 'We don't have any trouble in here,' one of them says as he looks down at you. It's easy for him to look down on you, since he's built like an Ogre. The entire tavern is staring at you, and word of your foolhardiness is going to get around. 1 is added to your Nemesis score. As you back away, the robed man slips out by a side-door and is gone. Lose 1 Luck point. Now, will you:
